Description: Azure AI Document Intelligence Service must have local authentication disabled
Enforce customer managed key for encryption in Azure AI Document Intelligence
Disable public access to Azure Document Intelligence Service
IT Hygiene: Azure Document Intelligence must be tagged per standards
Azure Event Grid domains should have local authentication methods disabled
Azure Event Grid domain should disable public network access
Azure Event Grid namespaces should disable public network access
Azure Event Grid topics should have local authentication methods disabled
Azure Event Grid topics should disable public network access
Azure Custom Vision Service must have local authentication disabled
Enforce customer managed key for encryption in Azure Custom Vision Service Resource
Disable public access to Azure Custom Vision Service
IT Hygiene: Azure AI Custom Vision Service must be tagged per standards
Ensure instances are created in CVSH approved locations us-central1 us-east4 us-west2
Ensure CMEK is required for Data Fusion instances
Ensure that only Private instances are created
Pipeline logging and monitoring must be enabled upon creation
RBAC must be enabled at all times
